text: Has anyone seen this effort before? I really like the idea of a JSON ish format that has a corresponding binary format (and also cleans up some other issues JSON has). <https://concise-encoding.org/>

attachments.title: Concise Encoding
attachments.text: The friendly data format for human and machine. Think JSON, but with 1:1 compatible twin binary and text formats, and rich type support.

elements.text: Has anyone seen this effort before? I really like the idea of a JSON ish format that has a corresponding binary format (and also cleans up some other issues JSON has).

attachments.title: Standards
attachments.text: [Title text] "Fortunately, the charging one has been solved now that we've all standardized on mini-USB. Or is it micro-USB? Shit."
